vlive.korean: 굉장히 더워요 오늘 땀 한바가지... it's quite hot. I sweated a lot. 듣기 View video ITZY : 오분브이에유❤️
vlive.english: it's quite hot. I sweated a lot.

vlive.korean: 응? - 바가지로 이렇게 머리 씌우고 이렇게 머리 잘라본 사람? Huh? - Anyone who have put on the bowl and had a hair cut? 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 바람 컴백한드아~~~~
vlive.english: Huh? - Anyone who have put on the bowl and had a hair cut?

vlive.korean: 맞아요 제가 잘라줬어요 - 혹시 바가지 대고 머리 잘라본 사람? Right. I cut it for him. - Anyone who used a bowl to cut your hair? 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 바람 컴백한드아~~~~
vlive.english: Right. I cut it for him. - Anyone who used a bowl to cut your hair?

vlive.korean: 형이 바가지 머리를 하고 있었거든요 - 어떻게 알아요? He had a bowl cut. - How did you know? 듣기 View video ATEEZ : 우&쫑과 함께 놀자 ❤️ATINY❤️
vlive.english: He had a bowl cut. - How did you know?

vlive.korean: 메로나 녹인 다음에 거기에 꿀을 한 바가지 넣은... You melt Melona and put a bucket of honey... 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full] SUPER JUNIOR-D&E X Rooftop Live / 슈퍼주니어-D&E의 루프탑라이브!
vlive.english: You melt Melona and put a bucket of honey...

examples.korean: Some local shops have been fleecing tourists. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 일부 지역 상점들이 관광객들에게 바가지를 씌워 왔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Some local shops have been fleecing tourists. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: $70 for a T-shirt! What a rip-off! 듣기 Add to Wordbook 티셔츠 하나에 70달러라구! 완전 바가지로군! Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: $70 for a T-shirt! What a rip-off! Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I got stung for a ￡100 meal. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 나는 식사 한 끼 값에 100파운드라는 바가지를 썼다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I got stung for a ￡100 meal. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Make sure they don’t overcharge you for the drinks. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그들에게 술값 바가지 쓰지 않도록 해라. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Make sure they don’t overcharge you for the drinks. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She had been nagging him to paint the fence. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀가 그에게 울타리에 페인트칠을 하라고 바가지를 긁어 대던 참이었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
